levels.description: After deployment, immediately deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to all enemies within the frontal <@ba.rem>target tile</>; For the next <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds, continuously attacks ground units in that <@ba.rem>target tile</> with <@ba.vup>Arts</> damage
